item.title: Incomplete/wrong rendering
item.description:
From rdzid...@gmail.com on June 11, 2012 00:23:26
The wall of the "Altenburg castle" of Bamberg is not rendered, the towers are. Tested with OruxMaps and AdvancedMapViewer, exactly the same problem. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Altenburg_%28Bamberg%29 49.88061937°N, 10.8617996°E http://www.openstreetmap.org/?lat=49.880557&lon=10.869097&zoom=18&layers=M Might be related to #195 although I can't tell for sure.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=324

item.contents:
From rdzid...@gmail.com on June 12, 2012 07:30:58
fixing wrong link to map...
map http://download.mapsforge.org/maps/europe/germany/bayern.map 08-Jun-2012 00:50 146M
Screenshot is a bit more difficult - nonrooted android device and thus took a picture with a digicam.. hope that is good enough.
Attachment: rerr.jpg

From LudwigBr...@gmail.com on June 13, 2012 05:31:39
Sorry, forgot link for tag counts: http://tagwatch.stoecker.eu/Europe/En/ignored_building.html

From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on August 09, 2012 10:43:44
General remark: this issue has been closed weeks ago, please always open a new one to request a feature or report a bug.
Nevertheless i have just committed the requested change in revision r2094 , thanks for reporting.
